root.name: Silent Hill 2: Restless Dreams
root.description: OverviewSilent Hill 2: Restless Dreams is the upgraded "complete" edition of Silent Hill 2. It features six endings, and a main mission and a sub-mission, which are "Letter from Silent Heaven" featuring James Sunderland and "Born from a Wish" featuring Maria.The graphics were upgraded, but the overall look of the game remains the same. The Xbox version is the best experience due to fewer bugs.
